thread.title: MOVES-AIG names Mark Lyons as chief actuary for general insurance

title: MOVES-AIG names Mark Lyons as chief actuary for general insurance
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Insurer American International Group Inc on Monday named Mark Lyons as senior vice president & chief actuary for general insurance.
Lyons will be joining AIG from insurer Arch Capital Group , where he was chief financial officer since 2012. (Reporting by Parikshit Mishra in Bengaluru)
